Reviews.Title: “close to vatican an Tibor river.”
Reviews.Author: coinjack
Reviews.Content: stayed 5 days november prior tro trans atlantic cruise visit domus 5 ago larger expect clean breakfast include price lots choices lobby bar adaquate staffed location close busses 10 min walk subway restaurants borgo pio 3minute walk walked walked rooftop garden viewing st peters relaxing noisy tour buses esp am people close heavy doors staff friendly helpful price 130 euro night believe value

Reviews.Title: “Good Handicap Facilities”
Reviews.Author: Señora
Reviews.Content: enjoyed stay nights nov 12 3 2011 using wheel chair walker found equipped wheel chair fit door move bathroom safety bars pull plastic seat movable shower head glass doors shower entrance shower flat easily elevator able building told built patio access main lobby convenient front desk people helpful polite lounge nice access wifi breakfast sleeping cheery bright food rooftop patio beautiful fantastic view st peters dome castel san angelo definitely recommend domus friends visit rome 6 blocks vatican

Reviews.Title: “Best Value-10 mins to Vatican & museums-Very quiet and clean~”
Reviews.Author: CKBergfin
Reviews.Content: reception staff friendly helpful welcome expresso bonus quiet cold ac hearty breakfast beautiful views rooftop chapel connected domus comfy clean close museums shops vatican gelato 12 block bringing mom elevator stairs issue note reservations tour 36 mos ahead time enjoy

HotelInfo.Name: Domus Carmelitana
HotelInfo.Address: Via Alberico II, 44, 00193 Rome, Italy
